item.title: Enable Debugging in Jupyter Notebook
item.description: If you have Jupyter Lab 3.x, the extension is shipped by default.

item.title: Adjusting Profile Sidebar on Hugo Anatole
item.description: When view in Chrome, the profile picture occupies the center of the section and the rows of favicons (contact, linkedin, github…) got lost in the bottom.
